content: {"name": "Jamil Niner Student Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The pantry's online form for student shoppers opens every Sunday morning at 7:00 a.m. Shopping appointments can be scheduled between 11:00 - 4:30 p.m", "email": "", "url": "https://ninerpantry.charlotte.edu/food-pantry-request", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1224 John Kirk Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "University City South", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28262", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3099496, "longitude": -80.7239851}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 687-0289", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Students & staff only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
